title: Secrets
episode_desc: The small German town of Winden is shaken by the disappearance of a teenage boy. While the townsfolk are occupied with secrets of their own, at nightfall a group of teenagers attempts to recover something the missing boy may have left behind.
show_desc: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

title: Lies
episode_desc: When a grim discovery leaves the police baffled, Ulrich seeks a search warrant for the power plant. A mysterious stranger checks into the hotel.
show_desc: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

title: Past and Present
episode_desc: It's 1986, and Ulrich's brother, Mads, has been missing for a month. Confusion reigns as past and present intertwine.
show_desc: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

title: Double Lives
episode_desc: Bizarre occurrences give Charlotte a sense of déjà vu, and she suspects Peter is hiding something. Franziska snaps when Magnus confronts her.
show_desc: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

title: Truths
episode_desc: Hannah takes her obsession with Ulrich too far. The stranger asks Regina to deliver an important package. Martha is torn between Jonas and Bartosz.

title: Sic Mundus Creatus Est
episode_desc: Ulrich looks to the past for answers and dredges up disturbing family secrets. Armed with new tools, Jonas probes the cave's murky depths.
show_desc: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

title: Crossroads
episode_desc: Ulrich questions a frail and frightened Helge in the nursing home. Jonas searches for Mikkel, but the stranger warns him about meddling with the past.

title: As You Sow, so You Shall Reap
episode_desc: In 1953, the disfigured bodies of two boys are exhumed at a construction site, the future location of Winden's nuclear power plant.
show_desc: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

title: Beginnings and Endings
episode_desc: Six months after the disappearances, the police form a task force. In 2052, Jonas learns that most of Winden perished in an apocalyptic event.
show_desc: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

episode_desc: Clausen and Charlotte interview Regina. The Stranger takes Hannah to 1987, where Claudia has an unnerving encounter and Egon visits an old nemesis.
